c74object.name: bach.print
c74object.digest: Print lllls in the Max window
c74object.description: Displays lllls in the Max window.

objarg.name: name
objarg.description: bach.print's optional argument is the name of the object, to be displayed in the "object" column of the Max window.

method.name: llll
method.description: The llll is displayed in text format on a single line. If a line in the Max window is double-clicked, the bach.print object that wrote it is highlighted.

attribute.name: error
attribute.description: When set to 1, the lllls are printed on a red background, as an error message. When set to 2, the lllls are printed on a yellow background, as a warning message.

attribute.name: maxdecimals
attribute.description: The maximum number of decimal digits to be displayed for floats. The default is 6.

c74object.discussion: The llll is displayed on a single line, in text format.

entry.name: More details
entry.description: The llll is displayed on a single line, in text format.
